contentText.text: At the hospital, the doctors have an unexpected concern about Jian’s wife’s health that is, thankfully, resolved. When Jian is called over to talk to the doctor, he locks his screen and removes the thumb drive from his laptop. Fortunately, it is in his pocket when the laptop is stolen from the waiting room.
Jian notifies IT of the theft, and he is able to call Holly from a private room with his supplier recommendations, solving the immediate issue.

revelCollOut.text: At least I finished the work on the supplier project before my laptop was stolen, and I was able to share the recommendations Holly needed. Now I just need a way to get my supplier master file updates back into the system.
